commit_message: feat: generate nuccov track for MNase

fix: mv final mcool and pairs files in correct subfolders

refactor conversion to cool file, now only using cload (no rebin)
fix samtools markdup and bowtie options
feat: filtering mito chr. from cool file
fix: ignore duplicates and peak calling w/o calib
fix: try to fix exit signal when cleaning up
fix: exit with error after trapping errors
fix: prevent missing juicer_tools and mv errors
feat: trap exit signals and cleanup before exit
fix: improve variables for names of HiC files
fix: variables for names of HiC files
fix: create hash subdir in hic tmp folder
fix: filling pairs in RNAseq coverage tracks
fix: remove extendReads for RNAseq tracks
fix: match plot names with hicstuff output plots
fix: remove duplicates to compute HiC coverage
fix: conda channels order and samtools version
doc: improve install and cluster use
dep: add hicstuff to requirements yaml
dep: add bedtools, java and bedgraphtobigwig deps
feat: search for <SAMPLE>_nxq_R*.fq.gz if <SAMPLE>_R*.fq.gz not found

feat: change default fastq names to *.fq.gz
fix: no default mode, check that mode exists
fix: increase max frag length to 1000 in bowtie2
fix: include hicstuff stats at the end
fix: start-up messages about input and calib
fix: cp from remote to data/reads/
feat: add support for other filenames (end*) and multiple files to be catenated
support for fastq files through ssh
add option to filter mnase frags based on size
fix bug with mawk in fn_exec
purge empty dirs at the end
read filtering and duplicates removal args

add conda env specs
